properties.name: core-banking.migration-mode
properties.description: Migration mode for core banking transition (FULLY_MIGRATED, PARTIAL, LEGACY)

properties.name: core-banking.cyclos-integration
properties.description: Enable integration with Cyclos banking system

properties.name: core-banking.accounts.minimum-balance.wallet
properties.description: Minimum balance requirement for wallet accounts

properties.name: core-banking.accounts.minimum-balance.savings
properties.description: Minimum balance requirement for savings accounts

properties.name: core-banking.accounts.minimum-balance.credit
properties.description: Minimum balance requirement for credit accounts

properties.name: core-banking.accounts.daily-limits.standard
properties.description: Daily transaction limit for standard accounts

properties.name: core-banking.accounts.daily-limits.premium
properties.description: Daily transaction limit for premium accounts

properties.name: core-banking.accounts.daily-limits.business
properties.description: Daily transaction limit for business accounts

properties.name: core-banking.accounts.monthly-limits.standard
properties.description: Monthly transaction limit for standard accounts

properties.name: core-banking.accounts.monthly-limits.premium
properties.description: Monthly transaction limit for premium accounts

properties.name: core-banking.accounts.monthly-limits.business
properties.description: Monthly transaction limit for business accounts

properties.name: core-banking.transactions.retry-attempts
properties.description: Number of retry attempts for failed transactions

properties.name: core-banking.double-entry.enforce-balance
properties.description: Enforce balance checks in double-entry bookkeeping

properties.name: core-banking.double-entry.audit-all-entries
properties.description: Enable auditing for all double-entry transactions

properties.name: core-banking.compliance.suspicious-activity-threshold
properties.description: Transaction amount threshold for suspicious activity reporting

properties.name: core-banking.compliance.kyc-required-threshold
properties.description: Transaction amount threshold requiring KYC verification

properties.name: core-banking.interest.batch-size
properties.description: Batch size for interest calculation processing

properties.name: core-banking.interest.calculation-days
properties.description: Number of days in year for interest calculation

properties.name: core-banking.interest.cron
properties.description: Cron expression for interest calculation schedule

properties.name: core-banking.interest.default-savings-rate
properties.description: Default annual interest rate for savings accounts (percentage)

properties.name: core-banking.interest.default-fixed-deposit-rate
properties.description: Default annual interest rate for fixed deposits (percentage)

properties.name: core-banking.interest.default-money-market-rate
properties.description: Default annual interest rate for money market accounts (percentage)

properties.name: core-banking.statements.cron
properties.description: Cron expression for automatic statement generation

properties.name: core-banking.statements.retention-days
properties.description: Number of days to retain generated statements

properties.name: core-banking.currency.cache-duration-minutes
properties.description: Duration to cache exchange rates in minutes

properties.name: core-banking.security.pii-masking
properties.description: Enable masking of Personally Identifiable Information in logs
